We can add edges by calling add_edges() method of the Graph class using the object g - but in order to add edges, we have to refer to existing vertices somehow. igraph uses integer vertex IDs starting from zero, thus the first vertex of your graph has index zero, the second vertex has index 1 and so on. Edges are specified by pairs of integers, so [(0,1), (1,2)] denotes a list of two edges: one between the first and the second, and the other one between the second and the third vertices of the graph.
